plot: A man who has been chained forever in a cave meets freedom in the outside world. The Cave is a short movie based on Plato's Allegory of the Cave.
title: The Cave
plot_es: A man who has been chained forever in a cave meets freedom in the outside world. The Cave is a short movie based on Plato's Allegory of the Cave.
plot_en: A man who has been chained forever in a cave meets freedom in the outside world. The Cave is a short movie based on Plato's Allegory of the Cave.
